name: Kestroll
long_description:
Kestroll is the AI-native digital and media asset management platform.

Kestroll automatically ingests, labels, and organizes all of your company's media assets and provides a central interface for the entire organization to access and distribute content.

The days of filtering through someone else's tags are past. With Kestroll, anyone in the organization can search in everyday language, based on visual cues, abstract concepts, creative intent, and more, without the burden of manual labeling.
one_liner: Agentic Digital and Media Asset Management
